quotes.quote: Leave any problem alone for long enough and it will solve itself.
When you come out of the storm, you won't be the same person who walked in. That's what this storm's all about.
Life could be so bad. Situation might be so hard but the Knowledge that you have GOD is something that cheers you up.
After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
A painter should begin every canvas with a wash of black, because all things in nature are dark except where exposed by the light.
Our greatest glory is not in ever failing, but in rising every time we fail.
The sun never stops shining, sometimes you just have to look beyond the clouds to see it.
Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
Hope, smiles from the threshold of the year to come, whispering 'it will be happier.
You will succeed if you persevere; and you will find joy in overcoming obstacles.
If at first you don't succeed, think how many people you've made happy.
Life is too short to spend even one day in misery.
If you paint in your mind a picture of bright and happy expectations, you put yourself into a condition conducive to your goal.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
You never fail until you stop trying.
Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this: You haven't.

Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead-end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.

Stop thinking you're not good enough. You are beautiful & way stronger than you realize. Stand up for yourself, don't just let people tear you down, because soon enough...You'll start tearing yourself down.
Every positive attempt was as a result of encouragement, every encouragement leads to success.
For every dark night, there is a brighter day.
There are many things evil people can take from you. However, they can never steal your ability to laugh and laugh loud.
Sometimes God puts us down so that we can learn how to stand again after a fall.
For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
Joy is what happens to us when we allow ourselves to recognize how good things really are.
I do not believe this darkness will endure.
A storm may bring its darkness, but you can bring your own sunshine.
Smile, even if it's fake. Laugh, even if you hurt. Don't let anyone get to you, you're beautiful regardless of what anyone says to you.
Five Ups of life: Buckle up, Start up, Keep it up, Don't give up, Cheer up.
Life is too short for us to dwell on sadness. Cheer up and live life to the fullest.
You'll never change your life until you change something you do daily. The secret of your success is found in your daily routine.
You are prettiest when you're happy. Don't waste time being sad.
I say to myself that I shall try to make my life like an open fireplace, so that people may be warmed and cheered by it and so go out themselves to warm and cheer.
I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains.
Nothing is permanent in this wicked world, not even our troubles.
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
Brighten someone else's day with your smile. Take the effort, walk the mile. While your depressed and feeling blue. Someone else will make the effort with you.
There are no failures - just experiences and your reactions to them.
Be strong, because things will get better. It may be stormy now, but it never rains forever.
Laugh now, cry later.
Have the will to be well, to be happy, and to live in joy.
Do not think of todays failures, but of the success that may come tomorrow.
No matter what looms ahead, if you can eat today, enjoy today, mix good cheer with friends today enjoy it and bless God for it.
Try and fail, but don't fail to try.
Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
